trans-unit.source: about_Scheduled_Jobs_Basics
trans-unit.target: about_Scheduled_Jobs_Basics

trans-unit.source: powershell, cmdlet
trans-unit.target: powershell 指令程式

trans-unit.source: About Scheduled Jobs Basics
trans-unit.target: 關於排程的工作的基本概念

trans-unit.source: about_Scheduled_Jobs_Basics
trans-unit.target: about_Scheduled_Jobs_Basics

trans-unit.source: about_Scheduled_Jobs_Basics
trans-unit.target: about_Scheduled_Jobs_Basics

trans-unit.source: SHORT DESCRIPTION
trans-unit.target: 簡短描述

trans-unit.source: Explains how to create and manage scheduled jobs.
trans-unit.target: 說明如何建立及管理排程工作。

trans-unit.source: LONG DESCRIPTION
trans-unit.target: 詳細描述

trans-unit.source: This topic shows how to perform basic tasks of creating and managing scheduled jobs.
trans-unit.target: 本主題說明如何執行基本工作的建立和管理排程的工作。

trans-unit.source: For information about more advanced tasks, see about_Scheduled_Jobs_Advanced.
trans-unit.target: 如需更多進階工作的資訊，請參閱 about_Scheduled_Jobs_Advanced。

trans-unit.source: HOW TO CREATE A SCHEDULED JOB
trans-unit.target: 如何建立排程的工作

trans-unit.source: To create a scheduled job, use the Register-ScheduledJob cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 若要建立排程的工作，請使用 Register-scheduledjob cmdlet。

trans-unit.source: The cmdlet requires a name and the commands or script that the job runs.
trans-unit.target: 此指令程式需要有名稱和命令或工作執行的指令碼。

trans-unit.source: You can either run the job immediately by adding the RunNow parameter, or create a job trigger and set job options when you create the job or at a later time.
trans-unit.target: 您可以立即執行工作，藉由新增 RunNow 參數，或建立工作觸發程序並建立工作時，或在稍後設定工作選項。

trans-unit.source: To create a job that runs a script, use the FilePath parameter to specify the path to the script file.
trans-unit.target: 若要建立執行指令碼的作業，請使用 FilePath 參數指定指令碼檔案的路徑。

trans-unit.source: To create a job that runs commands, use the ScriptBlock parameter.
trans-unit.target: 若要建立工作執行命令時，使用 ScriptBlock 參數。

trans-unit.source: The following command creates the ProcessJob, which runs a Get-Process command.
trans-unit.target: 下列命令會建立 ProcessJob，它會執行 Get-process 命令。

trans-unit.source: This scheduled job has the default job options and no job trigger.
trans-unit.target: 此排程的作業都預設工作選項，沒有工作觸發程序。

trans-unit.source: PS C:> Register-ScheduledJob -Name ProcessJob -ScriptBlock { Get-Process }
trans-unit.target: PS C: > Register-scheduledjob-名稱 ProcessJob ScriptBlock {Get-process}

trans-unit.source: Id Name Triggers Command Enabled
trans-unit.target: 識別碼名稱保護啟用觸發程序的命令

trans-unit.source: 8 ProcessJob {} Get-Process True
trans-unit.target: 8 ProcessJob {} Get-process True

trans-unit.source: HOW TO CREATE A JOB TRIGGER
trans-unit.target: 如何建立工作觸發程序

trans-unit.source: Job triggers start a scheduled job automatically.
trans-unit.target: 工作觸發程序會自動啟動排程的工作。

trans-unit.source: A job trigger can be one-time or recurring schedule or an event, such as when a user logs on or Windows starts.
trans-unit.target: 工作觸發程序可以是一次性或週期性排程或事件，例如當使用者登入或 Windows 啟動時。

trans-unit.source: Each job can have zero, one, or multiple job triggers.
trans-unit.target: 每個工作可以有零個、 一個或多個工作觸發程序。

trans-unit.source: To create a job trigger, use the New-JobTrigger cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 若要建立工作觸發程序，使用 New-jobtrigger 指令程式。

trans-unit.source: The following command creates a job trigger that starts a job every Monday and Thursday at 5:00 AM.
trans-unit.target: 下列命令會建立工作觸發程序啟動工作，每個星期一和星期四，上午 5:00。

trans-unit.source: The command saves the job trigger in the $t variable.
trans-unit.target: 命令會將工作觸發程序儲存在 $t 變數。

trans-unit.source: $t = New-JobTrigger -Weekly -DaysOfWeek "Monday", "Thursday" -At "5:00 AM"
trans-unit.target: $t = 新 JobTrigger-每週 DaysOfWeek"Monday"、"Thursday"-在 「 上午 5:00"

trans-unit.source: Job triggers are optional.
trans-unit.target: 工作觸發程序是選擇性的。

trans-unit.source: You can start a scheduled job at any time by adding the RunNow parameter to your Register-ScheduledJob command, or by using the Start-Job cmdlets.
trans-unit.target: RunNow 參數加入至 Register-scheduledjob 命令，或使用 Start-job cmdlet，您可以在任何時間啟動排程的工作。

trans-unit.source: HOW TO ADD A JOB TRIGGER
trans-unit.target: 如何新增工作觸發程序

trans-unit.source: When you add a job trigger to a scheduled job, the job trigger is added to the scheduled job XML file for the scheduled job and becomes part of the scheduled job.
trans-unit.target: 當您新增工作觸發程序至排程工作時，工作觸發程序加入至排程工作的排程的工作 XML 檔案，並排程工作的一部份。

trans-unit.source: You can add a job trigger to a scheduled job when you create the scheduled job or at a later time and you can change the job trigger of a scheduled job at any time.
trans-unit.target: 您可以新增工作觸發程序至排程工作，當您建立排程的工作，或在稍後的時間和您可以隨時變更排程工作的工作觸發程序。

trans-unit.source: Windows PowerShell uses some of the same job triggers that Task Scheduler uses.
trans-unit.target: Windows PowerShell 使用的相同工作觸發程序的工作排程器會使用一些。

trans-unit.source: For detailed information about job triggers, see the help topic for the New-JobTrigger cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 如需工作觸發程序的詳細資訊，請參閱 New-jobtrigger 指令程式的 [說明] 主題。

trans-unit.source: The following command uses the Register-ScheduledJob cmdlet to create the process job.
trans-unit.target: 下列命令使用 Register-scheduledjob cmdlet 來建立處理程序工作。

trans-unit.source: It uses the Trigger parameter to specify the job trigger in the $t variable.
trans-unit.target: 它使用觸發程序參數指定在 $t 變數的工作觸發程序。

trans-unit.source: Register-ScheduledJob -Name ProcessJob -ScriptBlock {Get-Command} -Trigger $t
trans-unit.target: Register-scheduledjob-名稱 ProcessJob ScriptBlock {Get-command}-$t 觸發程序

trans-unit.source: You can also add a job trigger to an existing scheduled job at any time.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以在任何時候新增現有的排程工作的工作觸發程序。

trans-unit.source: The following command adds the job trigger in the $t variable to the ProcessJob scheduled job.
trans-unit.target: 下列命令會將工作觸發程序在 $t 變數 ProcessJob 排定的工作。

trans-unit.source: Add-JobTrigger -Name ProcessJob -Trigger $t
trans-unit.target: Add-jobtrigger-名稱 ProcessJob-$t 觸發程序

trans-unit.source: As a result of this command, the job trigger starts the ProcessJob automatically every Monday and Thursday at 5:00 AM.
trans-unit.target: 此命令的結果工作觸發程序 ProcessJob 會自動啟動每個星期一和星期四上午 5:00。

trans-unit.source: HOW TO GET A JOB TRIGGER
trans-unit.target: 如何取得工作觸發程序

trans-unit.source: To get the job trigger of a scheduled job, use the Get-JobTrigger cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 若要取得排程工作的工作觸發程序，請使用 Get-jobtrigger cmdlet。

trans-unit.source: Use the Name, ID, and InputObject parameters to specify the scheduled job (not the job trigger).
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用名稱、 識別碼和 InputObject 參數來指定排程的作業 （不工作觸發程序）。

trans-unit.source: The following command gets the job trigger of the ProcessJob.
trans-unit.target: 下列命令會取得 ProcessJob 工作觸發程序。

trans-unit.source: PS C:> Get-JobTrigger -Name ProcessJob
trans-unit.target: PS C: > Get-jobtrigger-名稱 ProcessJob

trans-unit.source: Id Frequency Time DaysOfWeek Enabled
trans-unit.target: 啟用識別碼頻率時間 DaysOfWeek

trans-unit.source: 1 Weekly 11/7/2011 5:00:00 AM {Monday, Thursday} True
trans-unit.target: 1 週 2011 年 11 月 7 日上午 5:00:00 {星期一、 星期四} True

trans-unit.source: HOW TO CREATE JOB OPTIONS
trans-unit.target: 如何建立工作選項

trans-unit.source: Job options establish conditions for starting and running the job.
trans-unit.target: 工作選項建立啟動並執行工作的條件。

trans-unit.source: Every job has the default job options unless you change them.
trans-unit.target: 每個作業有預設工作選項，除非您變更它們。

trans-unit.source: Because job options can prevent a job from running at the scheduled time, it is important to understand the job options and use them carefully.
trans-unit.target: 因為工作選項可以防止在排程時間執行工作，請務必了解工作選項，並謹慎使用這些。

trans-unit.source: Windows PowerShell uses the same job options that Task Scheduler uses.
trans-unit.target: Windows PowerShell 會使用工作排程器會使用的相同工作選項。

trans-unit.source: For detailed information about the job options, see the help topic for the New-ScheduledJobOption cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 如需工作選項的詳細資訊，請參閱 New-scheduledjoboption 指令程式的 [說明] 主題。

trans-unit.source: Type "Get-Help New-ScheduledJobOption" or see the help topic online at http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=223915.
trans-unit.target: 輸入"Get-help New-scheduledjoboption 」，或請參閱線上說明主題在 http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=223915。

trans-unit.source: Job options are stored in the scheduled job XML file.
trans-unit.target: 排程的工作的 XML 檔案中儲存工作選項。

trans-unit.source: You can set job options when you create a scheduled job or change them at any time.
trans-unit.target: 當您建立排程的工作，或隨時變更它們，您可以設定工作選項。

trans-unit.source: The following command creates a scheduled job option in which the WakeToRun scheduled job option is set to True.
trans-unit.target: 下列命令會建立 WakeToRun 排程工作選項設定為 True 的排程的工作選項。

trans-unit.source: The WakeToRun option runs the scheduled job even if the computer is in the Sleep or Hibernate state at the scheduled start time.
trans-unit.target: WakeToRun 選項執行排程的工作，即使電腦處於睡眠或休眠狀態的已排程的開始時間。

trans-unit.source: The command saves the job options in the $o variable.
trans-unit.target: 命令會將 $o 變數中儲存的工作選項。

trans-unit.source: $o = New-ScheduledJobOption -WakeToRun
trans-unit.target: $o = 新 ScheduledJobOption WakeToRun

trans-unit.source: HOW TO GET JOB OPTIONS
trans-unit.target: 如何取得工作選項

trans-unit.source: To get the job options of a scheduled job, use the Get-ScheduledJobOption cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 若要取得排程工作的工作選項，請使用 Get-scheduledjoboption 指令程式。

trans-unit.source: Use the Name, ID, and InputObject parameters to specify the scheduled job (not the job options).
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用名稱、 識別碼和 InputObject 參數來指定排程的工作 （而不工作選項）。

trans-unit.source: The following command gets the job options of the ProcessJob.
trans-unit.target: 下列命令會取得 ProcessJob 的工作選項。

trans-unit.source: PS C:> Get-ScheduledJobOption -Name ProcessJob
trans-unit.target: PS C: > Get-scheduledjoboption-名稱 ProcessJob

trans-unit.source: StartIfOnBatteries : False StopIfGoingOnBatteries : True WakeToRun : False StartIfNotIdle : True StopIfGoingOffIdle : False RestartOnIdleResume : False IdleDuration : 00:10:00 IdleTimeout : 01:00:00 ShowInTaskScheduler : True RunElevated : False RunWithoutNetwork : True DoNotAllowDemandStart : False MultipleInstancePolicy : IgnoreNew JobDefinition : Microsoft.PowerShell.ScheduledJob.ScheduledJobDefinition
trans-unit.target: StartIfOnBatteries: False StopIfGoingOnBatteries: True WakeToRun: False StartIfNotIdle: True StopIfGoingOffIdle: False RestartOnIdleResume: False IdleDuration︰ 時間 00:10:00: 01:00:00 ShowInTaskScheduler: True RunElevated: False RunWithoutNetwork: True DoNotAllowDemandStart: False MultipleInstancePolicy: IgnoreNew JobDefinition: Microsoft.PowerShell.ScheduledJob.ScheduledJobDefinition

trans-unit.source: HOW TO CHANGE JOB OPTIONS
trans-unit.target: 如何變更工作選項

trans-unit.source: You can change the job options of a scheduled job when you create a scheduled job or at any time thereafter.
trans-unit.target: 您可以變更排程工作，當您建立排程的工作時或之後的任何時間的工作選項。

trans-unit.source: The following command uses the Register-JobTrigger cmdlet to create the process job.
trans-unit.target: 下列命令會使用暫存器 JobTrigger 指令程式來建立處理程序的工作。

trans-unit.source: It uses the ScheduledJobOption parameter to specify the job options in the $o variable.
trans-unit.target: 它會使用 ScheduledJobOption 參數 $o 變數中指定的工作選項。

trans-unit.source: Register-JobTrigger -Name ProcessJob -ScriptBlock {Get-Process} -ScheduledJobOption $o
trans-unit.target: 暫存器 JobTrigger-名稱 ProcessJob-ScriptBlock {Get-process} ScheduledJobOption $o

trans-unit.source: You can also change the job options to an existing scheduled job at any time.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以隨時變更現有排程工作的工作選項。

trans-unit.source: The following command uses the Set-ScheduledJobOption cmdlet to change the value of the WakeToRun option of the ProcessJob scheduledJob to True.
trans-unit.target: 下列命令會使用 Set-scheduledjoboption 指令程式，將 ProcessJob scheduledJob WakeToRun 選項的值變更為 True。

trans-unit.source: Like all of the Set cmdlets in the PSScheduledJob module, Set-ScheduledJobOption cmdlet does not have Name or ID parameters.
trans-unit.target: 如同所有集合中的指令程式 PSScheduledJob 模組 Set-scheduledjoboption cmdlet 沒有名稱或 ID 參數。

trans-unit.source: You can use the InputObject parameter to specify the scheduled job options or pipe a scheduled job from Get-ScheduledJobOption cmdlet to Set-ScheduledJobOption.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用 InputObject 參數來指定排程的工作選項，或使用管線傳送 Set-scheduledjoboption Get-scheduledjoboption cmdlet 的排定的工作。

trans-unit.source: The following command uses the Get-ScheduledJob cmdlet to get the ProcessJob.
trans-unit.target: 下列命令會取得 ProcessJob 使用 Get-scheduledjob 指令程式。

trans-unit.source: It uses the Get-ScheduledJobOption cmdlet to get the job options in the ProcessJob and the Set-ScheduledJobOption cmdlet to change the WakeToRun job option in the ProcessJob to True.
trans-unit.target: 它使用 Get-scheduledjoboption cmdlet 來取得 ProcessJob 和 Set-scheduledjoboption 指令程式中的工作選項，將在 ProcessJob WakeToRun 工作選項變更為 True。

trans-unit.source: Get-ScheduledJob -Name ProcessJob | Get-ScheduledJobOption | Set-ScheduledJobOption -WakeToRun
trans-unit.target: Get-scheduledjob-名稱 ProcessJob |Get-scheduledjoboption |Set-scheduledjoboption WakeToRun

trans-unit.source: HOW TO GET SCHEDULED JOB INSTANCES
trans-unit.target: 如何取得排程的工作執行個體

trans-unit.source: When a scheduled job is started, Windows PowerShell creates a job instance that is similar to a standard Windows PowerShell background job.
trans-unit.target: 當排程的工作啟動時，Windows PowerShell 會建立類似於標準的 Windows PowerShell 背景工作的工作執行個體。

trans-unit.source: You can use the Job cmdlets, such as Get-Job, Stop-Job and Receive-Job to manage the job instances.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用各種 Job cmdlet，Get 作業，例如停止工作，以及接收工作管理工作執行個體。

trans-unit.source: NOTE: To use the Job cmdlets on instances of scheduled jobs, the PSScheduledJob module must be imported into the session.
trans-unit.target: 注意︰ 若要排程工作的執行個體上使用 Job cmdlet，PSScheduledJob 模組必須匯入工作階段。

trans-unit.source: To import the PSScheduledJob module, type "Import-Module PSScheduledJob" (without quotation marks) or use any Scheduled Job cmdlet, such as Get-ScheduledJob.
trans-unit.target: 若要匯入 PSScheduledJob 模組，輸入 「 匯入模組 PSScheduledJob"（不含引號） 或使用任何排程工作 cmdlet，例如 Get-scheduledjob。

trans-unit.source: To get all instances of Windows PowerShell scheduled jobs (and all active standard jobs), use the Get-Job cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 若要取得 Windows PowerShell 排程工作 （和所有作用中的標準工作） 的所有執行個體，請使用 Get-job cmdlet。

trans-unit.source: The following command imports the PSScheduledJob module and then gets all jobs on the local computer.
trans-unit.target: 下列命令匯入 PSScheduledJob 模組，並接著取得本機電腦上的 [所有工作。

trans-unit.source: PS C:> Import-Module PSScheduledJob
trans-unit.target: PS C: > 匯入模組 PSScheduledJob

trans-unit.source: PS C:> Get-Job
trans-unit.target: PS C: > Get 作業

trans-unit.source: The following command gets all instances of the ProcessJob on the local computer.
trans-unit.target: 下列命令會取得本機電腦上的 ProcessJob 所有執行個體。

trans-unit.source: PS C:> Get-Job -Name ProcessJob
trans-unit.target: PS C: > Get 作業-名稱 ProcessJob

trans-unit.source: Id Name PSJobTypeName State HasMoreData Location Command
trans-unit.target: 識別碼名稱 PSJobTypeName 狀態 HasMoreData 位置命令

trans-unit.source: 45 ProcessJob PSScheduledJob Completed True localhost Get-Process 46 ProcessJob PSScheduledJob Completed True localhost Get-Process 47 ProcessJob PSScheduledJob Completed True localhost Get-Process 48 ProcessJob PSScheduledJob Completed True localhost Get-Process 49 ProcessJob PSScheduledJob Completed True localhost Get-Process 50 ProcessJob PSScheduledJob Completed True localhost Get-Process 51 ProcessJob PSScheduledJob Completed True localhost Get-Process
trans-unit.target: 45 ProcessJob PSScheduledJob 完成，則為 True localhost Get-process 46 ProcessJob PSScheduledJob 完成，則為 True localhost Get-process 47 ProcessJob PSScheduledJob 完成，則為 True localhost Get-process 48 ProcessJob PSScheduledJob 完成，則為 True localhost Get-process 49 ProcessJob PSScheduledJob 完成，則為 True localhost Get-process 50 ProcessJob PSScheduledJob 完成，則為 True localhost Get-process 51 ProcessJob PSScheduledJob 完成，則為 True localhost Get 程序

trans-unit.source: The default display does not show the start time, which typically distinguishes instances of the same scheduled job.
trans-unit.target: 預設顯示不會顯示的開始時間、 通常會區分相同的排程工作的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The following command uses the Format-Table cmdlet to display the Name, ID, and BeginTime properties of the scheduled job.
trans-unit.target: 下列命令使用 Format-table 指令程式，來顯示排程工作的名稱、 識別碼和 BeginTime 屬性。

trans-unit.source: PS C:> Get-Job ProcessJob | Format-Table -Property Name, ID, BeginTime
trans-unit.target: PS C: > Get-job ProcessJob |格式化表格的屬性名稱、 識別碼、 BeginTime

trans-unit.source: Name Id BeginTime
trans-unit.target: 名稱識別碼 BeginTime

ProcessJob 43 11/2/2011年上午 3:00:02 ProcessJob 44 11/3/2011年上午 3:00:02 ProcessJob 45 11/4/2011年上午 3:00:02 ProcessJob 46 11/5/2011年上午 3:00:02 ProcessJob 47 11/6/2011年上午 3:00:02 ProcessJob 48 11/7/2011年 12:00:01 AM ProcessJob 49 11/7/2011年上午 3:00:02 ProcessJob 50 11/8/2011年上午 3:00:02

trans-unit.source: GET SCHEDULED JOB RESULTS
trans-unit.target: 取得排程的工作的結果

trans-unit.source: To get the results of an instance of a scheduled job, use the Receive-Job cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 若要取得排程工作的執行個體的結果，請使用 Receive-job cmdlet。

trans-unit.source: NOTE: To use the Job cmdlets on instances of scheduled jobs, the PSScheduledJob module must be imported into the session.
trans-unit.target: 注意︰ 若要排程工作的執行個體上使用 Job cmdlet，PSScheduledJob 模組必須匯入工作階段。

trans-unit.source: To import the PSScheduledJob module, type "Import-Module PSScheduledJob" (without quotation marks) or use any Scheduled Job cmdlet, such as Get-ScheduledJob.
trans-unit.target: 若要匯入 PSScheduledJob 模組，輸入 「 匯入模組 PSScheduledJob"（不含引號） 或使用任何排程工作 cmdlet，例如 Get-scheduledjob。

trans-unit.source: The following command gets the results of the newest instance of the ProcessJob scheduled job (ID = 51)
trans-unit.target: 下列命令會取得最新的執行個體 ProcessJob 排程工作的結果 (識別碼 = 51)

trans-unit.source: PS C:> Import-Module PSScheduledJob
trans-unit.target: PS C: > 匯入模組 PSScheduledJob

trans-unit.source: PS C:> Receive-Job -ID 51 -Keep
trans-unit.target: PS C: > 接收工作識別碼 51-保留

trans-unit.source: The results of scheduled jobs are saved on disk, so the Keep parameter of Receive-Job is not required.
trans-unit.target: 排程工作的結果儲存在磁碟上，因此不需要接收作業的保留參數。

trans-unit.source: However, without the Keep parameter, you can get the results of a scheduled job only once in each Windows PowerShell session.
trans-unit.target: 不過，如果沒有保留參數，就可以排程的工作只能出現一次的結果中每個 Windows PowerShell 工作階段。

trans-unit.source: To start a new Windows PowerShell session, type "PowerShell" or open a new Windows PowerShell window.
trans-unit.target: 若要啟動新的 Windows PowerShell 工作階段，請輸入"PowerShell"或開啟新的 Windows PowerShell 視窗。

trans-unit.source: SEE ALSO
trans-unit.target: 另請參閱

trans-unit.source: about_Scheduled_Jobs about_Scheduled_Jobs_Advanced about_Scheduled_Jobs_Troubleshooting
trans-unit.target: about_Scheduled_Jobs about_Scheduled_Jobs_Advanced about_Scheduled_Jobs_Troubleshooting
